the ideological mold of Sarah Palin or Michele Bachman but without the "polarizing" temperament. For those who are in search of such a candidate, Mike Pence is their man; not Mitch Daniels . Mike Pence often describes himself as a Christian, a Conservative and a Republican, in that order. It was his social values and conservatism that imbued him with the intransigence to vote against No Child Left Behind, Medicare prescription drugs, TARP, and the Obama tax/unemployment deal.
